Description.SourceString: A rare perk, Regen increases the amount of HP and Mana your Heroes gain when you color match. This perk is an absolute bonus to your normal regen, making it quickly scale up any other bonuses you might receive.
Description.LocalizedString: A rare perk, Regen increases the amount of HP and Mana your Heroes gain when you color match. This perk is an absolute bonus to your normal regen, making it quickly scale up any other bonuses you might receive.
